fact: India is the world's largest democracy and the birthplace of yoga.
France is home to the Eiffel Tower and is the most visited country in the world.
Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands and is famous for its cherry blossoms and sushi.
Brazil is the largest country in South America and home to the Amazon Rainforest, the world's largest tropical rainforest.
Antigua is known for having 365 beaches — one for every day of the year.
